name: Lollipop Launch
description:
Blast your way through 15 exciting levels with your gravity-bending lollipop!

Swing to knock away pesky caramel cubes and smack with such force that you fly hundreds of feet through the air!

Controls:
Use the mouse to look around. While in midair, you'll drift in whatever direction you're facing, so make sure to turn back around and face your destination after blasting off.

Hold right click to "charge" your lollipop's energy, then release it to launch yourself backwards. You get 3 charges which replenish when you land on solid ground, meaning you can launch yourself again in the air if your trajectory is off!

Use left click to swing your lollipop in front of you, which will knock caramel cubes away with explosive force. Left click will also cancel your lollipop's charge.

Made in 3 days for Mini Game Jam 66: Sweets.
